title: Ekstra Bladet Comparison Website
description: Designed the comparison website and campaign material for Ekstra Bladet at Adservice.
challenge: Adservice is an affiliate company that connects advertisers and publishers. Ekstra Bladet was one of our publishers which wanted to generate revenue with their large traffic, through a comparison solution.
solution: A comparison website and campaign material were designed resulting in several subpages of different popular services such as internet, eletricity, telephone subscriptions and streaming services.
